summary.span: 提供方法，派生的任务处理程序类可实施该方法以处理异步任务。

span.span: Provides methods that a derived task handler class can implement in order to process an asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种简单的方法来处理异步任务，而无需实现 和 方法。The class provides a simplified way to handle asynchronous tasks without having to implement the and methods. 若要为异步任务创建处理程序，可以重写 方法并实现自定义任务处理代码。To create a handler for an asynchronous task, you can override the method and implement custom task handling code.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the task handler class instance can be reused for another asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要为异步任务创建自定义处理程序，请重写 方法。To create a custom handler for an asynchronous task, override the method.
